subject: Vam reactors power supply cable
description_text:

________________________________


Georgia College & State University has provided this email account to a retiree of the university. GCSU makes no assertions or warranties, expressed or implied, concerning the content of this email.

conversations.body_text: Hi Randy Monnett,     Please provide your order number so I can check whether the power connector was missing. You may also take a photo of all the items you received. If it is indeed missing, we will send you a replacement power cable tomorrow (Monday).  Also, please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address so we can arrange the replacement.
